synopsis.text:
So, what do the eccentric characters of "Dorohedore" get up to when they're not embroiled in their usual chaos? This special episode gives us a delightful glimpse into their leisurely pursuits through six captivating short stories.

Join Kamen Kakusa Fujita as he embarks on an exciting quest to obtain a mask from a Devil at a mask conjuring ritual, just like his comrades Noi and Shin. Meanwhile, Tenpo For You Nikaidou finds herself in a tight spot, selling gyoza on the streets of the Hole. She stumbles upon a charming tea and sweets shop owned by the amiable Syueron, but there seems to be a mysterious grudge held against him by the locals.

Ebisu, intrigued by the portraits adorning the mansion, seeks En's help for her own, only to be disappointed by the strict family-only policy. The Gyoza Fairy, tasked with maintaining the Hungry Bug and ensuring the gyoza's deliciousness, becomes agitated when Nikaidou's customers fail to savor their meals properly.

Prepare for a thrilling masquerade ball hosted by En, where tradition dictates that attendees must dance with a partner to appease the Devils, or face unpleasant consequences! Lastly, join Kaiman in learning the art of preparing oba gyoza from Nikaidou, commemorating a special day.

This special episode offers a delightful blend of humor, intrigue, and excitement, making it a must-watch for fans of "Dorohedoro".
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
